verses.verse: <S%H2063>"Yes,<s%> at this my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembles,<s%> and is moved <S%H5425>out<s%> of its <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H8085>oh,<s%> hear the <S%H7267>noise<s%> of his <S%H7267>voice,<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> that goes <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H3474>sends<s%> <S%H8281>it<s%> forth under the whole <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and his <S%H216>lightning<s%> to the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> it a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7580>roars.<s%> He <S%H7481>thunders<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1347>majesty.<s%> He <S%H6117>doesn't<s%> hold back anything when his <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7481>thunders<s%> <S%H6381>marvelously<s%> with his <S%H6963>voice.<s%> He <S%H6213>does<s%> great <S%H1419>things,<s%> which we <S%H3045>can't<s%> comprehend.

For he <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H7950>snow,<s%> <S%H1933><s%> 'Fall on the <S%H776>earth;<s%>' likewise to the <S%H4306>shower<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and to the <S%H4306>showers<s%> of his <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H1653>rain.<s%>
He seals <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H120>man,<s%> that all <S%H582>men<s%> whom he has made may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4639>it.<s%>
Then the <S%H2416>animals<s%> <S%H935>take<s%> <S%H695>cover,<s%> <S%H1119><s%> and <S%H7931>remain<s%> in their <S%H695>dens.<s%>
Out of its <S%H2315>room<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> the <S%H5492>storm,<s%> and <S%H7135>cold<s%> out of the <S%H4215>north.<s%>
By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> ice is <S%H5414>given,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> is <S%H4164>frozen.<s%>
<S%H2959>Yes,<s%> he loads the thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%> with <S%H7377>moisture.<s%> He <S%H6327>spreads<s%> abroad the <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of his <S%H216>lightning.<s%>

It is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H4524>around<s%> by his <S%H8458>guidance,<s%> that they may <S%H6467>do<s%> whatever he <S%H6680>commands<s%> them on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>habitable<s%> <S%H8398>world,<s%>
Whether it is for <S%H7626>correction,<s%> or for his <S%H776>land,<s%> or for loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> that he causes it to <S%H4672>come.<s%>
<S%H238>"Listen<s%> to <S%H347>this,<s%> Job. Stand <S%H5975>still,<s%> and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works of <S%H410>God.<s%>
Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>controls<s%> <S%H216>them,<s%> and causes the lightning of his <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3313>shine?<s%>
Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4657>workings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> the wondrous <S%H4652>works<s%> of him who is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1843>knowledge?<s%>
You whose <S%H899>clothing<s%> is <S%H2525>warm,<s%> when the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H8252>still<s%> by reason of the south <S%H1864>wind?<s%>
Can <S%H7554>you,<s%> with him, spread out the <S%H7834>sky,<s%> which is <S%H2389>strong<s%> as a cast <S%H3332>metal<s%> <S%H7209>mirror?<s%>
<S%H3045>Teach<s%> us what we shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6186>him,<s%> for we can't make our case by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
Shall it be <S%H5608>told<s%> him that I would <S%H1696>speak?<s%> Or should a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>wish<s%> that he were swallowed <S%H1104>up?<s%>
Now men <S%H7200>don't<s%> see the <S%H216>light<s%> which is <S%H925>bright<s%> in the <S%H7834>skies,<s%> but the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5674>passes,<s%> and clears <S%H2891>them.<s%>
Out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> golden <S%H2091>splendor.<s%> With <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H1935>majesty.<s%>

We <S%H4672>can't<s%> reach the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%> He is <S%H7689>exalted<s%> in <S%H3581>power.<s%> In <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> he will not <S%H6031>oppress.<s%>
Therefore <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3372>revere<s%> <S%H7200>him.<s%> He doesn't regard any who are <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"
